Talk201:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Link, you have proven you are ready for
more of a challenge. I suggest you try the
<clr:0000>advanced course<clr:ffff>.
Talk203:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You simply pass through as many of the
<clr:0000>floating rings <clr:ffff>as you can <clr:0000>before time
runs out<clr:ffff>.
And don't stray too far, hm? You'll be
disqualified if you leave the Flight Range
partway through.<sp:0:4:0>Score high enough and I'll give you
a reward.

Note that in the advanced course, the
<clr:0000>number <clr:ffff>and <clr:0000>location <clr:ffff>of the rings is
different than in the beginner course.
Talk204:
<sp:3:0:2:0500>Hoo hoo! Was advanced too difficult?
Perhaps you should spend some time
practicing on the beginner course.
Talk205:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Not bad, but if I may... You do have some 
room for improvement. For a start, try to
memorize the locations of all the rings.
Talk206:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>Now that was some fancy flying!
I look forward to seeing you try the
course again.
Talk10:
In this course, individuals will train their
wits and agility by passing through a
series of <clr:0000>floating rings<clr:ffff>.
Talk207:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hoo hoo! Amazing! A little more practice
and you'll be able to clear all the rings.
Talk11:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice>Hoo? <sp:5:0:0>What is it, Link?<sp:5:0:0> Do you want to
stop training?
Talk208:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_01>Well, I never... <sp:5:0:0>You cleared all the rings
again? <sp:5:1:0>That's one for the history books!
Talk101:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Hoo hoo hoo... <sp:5:0:0>What do you say?<sp:5:0:0> Want to
try the training course again?<sp:0:4:0>I may give you a reward, depending on
how well you perform...
Talk13:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Very good... <sp:5:0:0>Just pass through as many
<clr:0000>floating rings <clr:ffff>as you can <clr:0000>before time
runs out<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>That's all there is to it!
Talk30:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>You cleared all of the rings on your very
first try? <sp:5:0:0>Astonishing!
Talk14:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>That said, no one has actually attempted
the course, as I only just finished it.<sp:0:4:0>Hopefully a brave volunteer comes along
soon to try it out...
Talk31: <sp:3:0:2:0700>Ah, Link. Care to try the course again?
Talk103:
<sp:3:0:2:0301>It seems you didn't quite hit your stride.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>I can't give you a reward, I'm afraid.<sp:5:0:0>
But I hope you'll try again!
Talk15:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>My hope is that this will teach young
warriors to fly more confidently even in
unfriendly skies.
Talk32:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_00>I see... <sp:5:0:0>If you change your mind, do let
me know.
Talk104:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think>Hmm. <sp:5:0:0>Not a spectacular result, but not
bad by any means.<sp:5:0:0>
Talk201_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>You're welcome to train here as often as
you like, in exchange for a nominal
participation fee.
Please do come again, Link. Your feats
are an inspiration to others.
Talk16:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hoo hoo! Care to try my new
training course?
Talk105:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Well done, Link! <sp:5:0:0>Who knew you could
move so gracefully?
Talk17:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I understand. But if you stop now, I can't
return your <clr:0000>20 rupee <clr:ffff>participation fee.
Talk106:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Hoo hoo hoo! You positively soared!
Are you sure you're not part Rito?<sp:5:0:0>
Talk107:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_01>You flew so well, I could have sworn you
had wings!<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>We Rito could stand to learn a thing or
two from you.
Talk108:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>That will serve as a good reference for
instructing the young warriors who train
here. <sp:5:0:0>Now, take this.
Talk101_00_01: <sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting_00>Link! <sp:5:1:0>Thank you for coming all this way.
Talk109:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Please return if ever you feel like
trying again.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>You're welcome anytime! <sp:5:0:0>Hoo hoo!
Talk101_00_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting_00>Link! <sp:5:1:0>What a pleasant surprise, seeing you
here so bright and early.
Talk101_00_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting_00>Link! <sp:5:1:0>Thank you for making your way
here at such a late hour.
Talk101_00_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting_00>Link! <sp:5:1:0>Thank you for coming in spite of
the snow.
Talk208_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>I can't believe it!<sp:5:1:0> You passed through all
of the rings.

What an incredible showing.<sp:5:1:0> I'll record
what I saw today so that posterity will
know of the flying Hylian.
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Please, take this in exchange for your
tremendous efforts.
Talk01_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Hoo hoo hoo! <sp:5:0:0>Hello there, Link!<sp:5:1:0> It's been
a while, hasn't it?

Teba told me all about what you didâ€”<sp:5:1:0>how
with your help, that wretched blizzard is
finally lifted.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>What's more, I hear you looked after
young Tulin every step of the way.

You have my thanks and my admiration,
for whatever an old bird's admiration is
worth.<sp:5:0:0> Hoo hoo...
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>As you've no doubt surmised, I retired
from my position as elder and entrusted
the village to Teba's leadership.
Now I spend my days here, at the Flight
Range, helping mold the next generation
of Rito warriors.
Talk01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Hoo hoo hoo!<sp:5:0:0> It's Link!<sp:0:4:0>Thank you for aiding Rito Village in our
struggle. With your help, that wretched
blizzard is finally lifted.<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0701>What's more, I hear you looked after
young Tulin every step of the way.<sp:0:4:0>You have my thanks and my admiration,
for whatever an old bird's esteem is
worth.<sp:5:0:0> Hoo hoo...
Talk02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>Hoo hoo! So you're stepping up? You
want to try my training course?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100>What a surprise, hoo hoo! And an honor!
Talk03:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>The rules are simple. You pass through as
many of the <clr:0000>floating rings <clr:ffff>as you can
<clr:0000>before time runs out<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0>
Oh, and don't stray too far, hm? You'll be
<clr:0000>disqualified <clr:ffff>if you leave the Flight Range.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>Since this is your first attempt, I'll go easy
on you... <sp:5:0:0>Let's say <clr:0000>15 rings <clr:ffff>is enough to
earn a passing grade.
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Manage that and I'll give you a
fitting reward.
Talk04: So! <sp:5:0:0>Care to give it a try?
Talk110:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The training course costs <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff>...
Will that be all right?
Talk05:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Hoo hoo hoo! <sp:5:0:0>Marvelous. <sp:5:0:0>I'll show you
to the starting position.
Talk22:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Happy>Hoo hoo!<sp:5:1:0> You cleared all of the rings?
Well done!<sp:5:0:0>
Talk111:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Oh dear... You don't appear to have
enough rupees. Please come again
after you've saved up a little.
Talk23:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Hoo hoo... <sp:5:0:0>What's the matter? Did you
have a mishap?<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>You're welcome to attempt the course
again, if you'd like.
Talk07:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You simply pass through as many of the
<clr:0000>floating rings <clr:ffff>as you can <clr:0000>before time
runs out<clr:ffff>.
And don't stray too far, hm? You'll be
disqualified if you leave the Flight Range
partway through.
To start, let's call <clr:0000>15 rings<clr:ffff> a passing
score. <sp:5:0:0>Clear that many and I'll give you
a reward.
Talk24:
<sp:3:0:2:0301>Oh dear... <sp:5:0:0>I'm afraid you did not pass
the course.<sp:5:1:0>
Talk41:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL>Link? <sp:5:0:0>Where are you going?<sp:5:0:0> You're not
allowed to leave the Flight Range!
Talk08:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I see. If you change your mind and want
to try the course, do let me know.
Talk09:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I regret to say that the blizzard ruined our
old training equipment.

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>But rather than try to re-create the
original course,<sp:5:0:0> I've taken this opportunity
to prepare a new one.
Talk26:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Well done, Link! You <clr:0000>passed<clr:ffff> with flying
colors, hoo hoo! <sp:5:1:0>Do you have a pair of
wings hidden under there?
You've set a high-water mark for my
trainees to aspire to.

Clearly I picked the right Hylian to give
this course a spin! <sp:5:1:0>Please, take this.
